title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Code to Policies: Accelerate Development w/ IAM Policy Autopilot (SEC351)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从代码到策略：使用 IAM 策略自动驾驶加速开发 (SEC351)
abstract: Are you tired of spending hours debugging IAM permissions instead of building features? In this session, learn how IAM Policy Autopilot helps you get started quickly with creating IAM policies that you can refine as your application evolves. We'll demonstrate how this open source MCP server integrates with AI coding assistants to analyze your application code and generate valid identity-based policies in real-time. Through live demos, you'll see how IAM Policy Autopilot provides functional policies that work from day one. Whether you're building serverless functions, containerized applications, or using AI coding assistants, you'll leave with hands-on experience using IAM Policy Autopilot to accelerate your development workflow.
abstract_cn: 您是否厌倦了花费数小时调试IAM权限而不是构建功能？在本次会议中，了解IAM Policy Autopilot如何帮助您快速开始创建IAM策略，这些策略可以随着应用程序的发展而完善。我们将演示这个开源MCP服务器如何与AI编码助手集成，分析您的应用程序代码并实时生成有效的基于身份的策略。通过现场演示，您将看到IAM Policy Autopilot如何提供从第一天就能工作的功能性策略。无论您是在构建无服务器函数、容器化应用程序，还是使用AI编码助手，您都将获得使用IAM Policy Autopilot加速开发工作流程的实践经验。
